text: "Thinking Out Loud" is a song by Ed Sheeran in his 2014 album Ã—. It was produced by Jake Gosling, and written by Ed Sheeran and singer Amy Wadge. The song was released in the United States on 24 September 2014; it also reached number 2 on the Billboard Hot 100. ==References== Category:2014 songs Category:Ed Sheeran songs
title: Thinking Out Loud
